thread.title: Great hotel, great staff!!
thread.title_full: Great hotel, great staff!! - Review of The Jewel facing Rockefeller Center, New York City, NY - TripAdvisor

author: Alton W
title: Great hotel, great staff!!
text: We were here for Valentines Day and this hotel did not disappoint! Our flight landed at 9, got to the hotel at 10. Check-in wasn't until 3 but we got a room as soon as we got there. The rooms are spacious and clean. The staff is phenomenal and informative!! Will definitely stay here again since I just found out that this is on our timeshare list! The name describes it to a tee because it is definitely a jewel!!
